values:
A poem for you... Ok so none of the words rhyme and none of the sentences go together but if I want to call it a poem then fuck you people.  Either read the shit or don't.  My life does not hinge on your decision. (It does,I need acceptance,read read).
Any way I have discovered few, very few, sure things in life.  In no random order here they are, in a not so poemey poem, just for you, to ignore, you fucks.
If you go into a crowded elevator and say "Man, have I got gas"  people WILL run.  They may be enclosed in a 2000lb steel trap moving at about 1 mile per hour, but those people will run.  Now, if you go into the same building that contains said elevator and yell fire those same people who would run into walls, steel walls, to get out of a gas filled nasal death trap...those people will just stand there.  They may look around, they may pick some lunch out of their teeth or their pants out of their ass, but do they run?  No!! And why don't they run?  They actually want to SEE the fire.  Seriously, next time you have the chance, without risking loss of job or life, because you may be pummeled later, just yell fire in a building.  Then look for superman... he's fucking there I swear to god he is.  He's the guy with his hands on his hips in that superman stance, you can almost see the wind blowing his hair, and he stands there and says:  "Fire, where is this fire you speak of".  As if he could put it out with his stance.  "This fire would be crazy to try and pass me when I am standing like this aaahhhhaaahhhaaahhhaaa!!!!"  Yeah, you know the guy I mean.  Every office has one.  Jackass.  The real dilemma comes if there is actually a fire.  Then YOU and YOU ALONE (Thanks Smokey) have the decision of saving him or letting him burn.  Me, I say fuck'em.  Lots of people stand that way and one less may improve the gene pool.  
Number 2 lesson:  Boys are dumb.  Now, I hear some of you bitching (I have really good hearing...yes I heard that too so shut up) but it is true.  Boys are dumb.  They spend YEARS trying to figure out women and NEVER GET IT. WTF??  Did I miss a meeting?  Women are SOOO easy to figure out it's not even funny.  The fucking rules to Candy Land are harder to figure out than most women.  OK guys, here you go... Be nice to them, cuddle, say sweet things, tell your friends, who know their friends how great they are.  Cause NO ONE can keep a secret.  Do all these things and do you know what you will get in return...fucking nothing because WOMEN ARE EVIL BITCHES.  It's what they do.  Men, you run the government, women hold the balls to that government and threaten to squash them whenever the chance arises.  Yes men, you may wear the uniform, but since your cocks make you act like puppets it is women who pull the strings.  That being said, next time you see a woman, punch her in the crotch, because the government sucks right now.

I was gonna give you 3 lessons but after reading back over this I realized it may be a bit too much for some of you to take... 
I do hope you learned something from my poem that was not a fucking poem and that it will somehow serve to brighten your day... really, I couldn't give a shit but it sounded good at the time.

See ya

Hello again.  Nope, still not dead yet... workin hard at it though.  I am sure Vic will let you all know when it happens...right Vic??  Few things have changed in my life, but those that have are AMAZING!!  I have decided I am gay.  OK OK, back off ladies, I am kidding... for now.  No, I did however meet a guy.  Yep I said it, a guy.  Yes friends, the "I will never date again" queen has had her stone heart melted... but alas, he IS gay.  Ha ha...back the fuck off Chris!!  What can I tell you about him???  Hmmmm, I can tell you how amazing his soul is, how huge his heart is, and that his hands are so big he could crush my skull like a twig.  I said back the fuck off Chris *wink* I already know you got your hands full at the moment baby!!  He is teh HAWT. 
Amber graduated from 5th grade last week.  I cried in the first 3 minutes.  The fucking kids weren't even in the room yet.  I laughed at my self... and I cheered for my lovely daughter.  
Hailey is speaking now.  I hate it when they do that shit.  And now, please gather around for Dot's Story Time.  Hailey speak 101...careful what you hear, or think you hear...
I was taking Amber to her last day of school so we could pick up her stuff.  Hailey was in her car seat in the back, mostly because when I strap her to the roof people stare, and we were driving along.  Hailey starts to babble, you know that cute baby babble, when she says the work "cock".  As a parent, what do you do in situations like this.  Well you "Hear and dismiss".  Those ARE "The Rules".  So I did just that.  I heard, and I dismissed.  But apparently Hailey does not know "The Rules" and so she just kept repeating it over and over and over.  So I pull up to the school, already shaken by the innocent new word my sweet baby has picked up, and BTW she didn't get that shit from me cause when would I be talking about it???  Anyway, I park and turn to face my two beauties for the first time in the ride.  Amber looks at me with her angel face and her spirit filled eyes and here is whay she said:  "Ummm Mom, I don't know what it is, but Hailey wants cock.  She wants it a lot, and she wants it now."  
Yeah, sure fuckers laugh... I on the other hand, had to follow "The Rules".  I had to sit straight faced as I ORDERED Amber to get out of the car.  She looked at me as if I were insane, but away she went.  And then... HOLY SHIT... I ROARED!!  I think I scared Hailey.  I also think I may have fractured a rib.  I had not laughed like that in forever.  Have I laughed like that since?  Yes I have.  Last night.  Love will do that to you.
See you all soon!!

Respond with one of your own...

How do you get a nun pregnant?


Dress her up as the altar boy.

Yes, it is I.  No, I did not die.  Nor was I captured by aliens.  Just got busy with the moving in November, and the new job.  Things have calmed down a bit as of late and now I have a bit of free time.  I hope to be able to write a bit more later, but for now I have to go back to work.  3 People have quit in the past 4 weeks and none of them have been replace.  Needless to say, I am doing the jobs of several people... and only getting paid for doing mine.  
Well, I hope everyone is doing well, and if you are not doing well, please tell me all about it because I thrive on the sadness of others.  Nudge, nudge. Snap, snap. Grin, grin. Wink, wink, say no more?

I am at work so I have no time.  Someone sent me this and I decided to make it into an icon.  I will try to write more later.  I have moved and am in the process of putting all my shit in order.  I hope to have more time later.

Mom is on her way back here.  D'ya know that feeling/taste you get in the back of your throat when you burp and puke a little at the same time?  I have had that going on ever since she called to say she was on her way.  

I think I am getting sick again.  I just got over a fucking cold and on Thursday, one of the girls in my office came in and she was sick.  Maybe it's the bird flu, come to pay me back for squashing that peach faced love bird all those years ago.  Serves me right!

I have been SOOOOOOO damn tired lately.  I am in bed at like 9:00 and I am still exhausted when I wake up.  I did have a pretty busy week at work though.  I hope that's all it is.  Wouldn't that just be my luck too.  I am exhausted when mom is gone and when she comes back I am back to normal and then I have to put up with her even more.  

I have been doing laundry all day.  I know what you are thinking, It's only 11:30am, all day has only been a few hours.  To this I will reply FUCK OFF, I've been up since 7 and started as soon as I got out of bed.  I am almost done though and Hailey went down for her nap so that made it quite a bit easier.  

The more I see Casey, the more I know why I left him.  Yes, he was a junkie, but emotionally I left him way before I did physically.  He just got evicted from his second apartment.  Yesterday he came over to "see Hailey", (I put up the quotes cause it's not like he has anywhere to go so why not come to my house and watch me take care of our daughter) and I mentioned that on Saturday he has to give me his support money and he just rolled his eyes and said he knows and I don't need to keep reminding him.  Right, cause he's been so good about any form of financial support in the past.  What the fuck was I thinking??  Man, I am just such a jerk!  I should just KNOW that on the 15th of every month he's going to come over, willingly, and hand over money.  PAUSE... Sorry, I had to open the door and let the monkey that just flew out of my ass go outside.

Well, the dryer is calling me so I gotta go for now.  I hope everyone has a better day than mine is shaping up to be.

1. How tall are you? 5'2"

2. Do you own a gun? Nope.

3. Rehab? Counseling? Tried both, neither worked.

4. Have you ever killed an animal? I killed a peach faced love bird by accident.  I stepped on it.

5. Are you Irish? Part

6. What do you think of hot dogs? They plump when ya cook em'.

7. What's your favorite Christmas song? All I want for Christmas is my two front teeth.

8. What is your favorite smell(s)? Pot smoke, Opium perfume, fire place...

9. What do you prefer to drink in the morning? OJ.

10. Do you do push ups? If I have to.

11. Have you ever done ecstasy? Yes

12. Have you been shot? With what? Heh heh heh

13. Have you ever been hospitalized? Duh! I have 2 kids.  I have also had my gallbladder and my tonsils removed.

14. Do you like pain killers? If I am in pain.  They make me itch though.

15. What is your secret weapon to lure in your preferred sex? I don't need a secret weapon... junkies and alcoholics just come a runnin'.  Yea me!!

16. Do you own a knife? Yes... Don't make me use it.

17. Do you have A.D.D? Wait, what was the question?

18. Do you love the pain a tattoo brings? Dunno, I was on muscle relaxers when I got mine.

19. Name Five Drinks You Regularly Drink: Diet Coke, water, Diet Coke, water and Diet Coke.

20. What's In Your CD Player? A Perfect Circle, Me de Noms.  I am listening to "Thinking of You"  It's about jerking off.  Yes Phoenix, it is kind of ironic that I like a song about masturbation.

21. Who is your best friend? My sister, Viki.

22. What's Under Your Bed? I don't have a bed right now... but I will in 12 days!!

23. Current Hair? Shaved on the sides with a tuft in the middle... wait, did you mean on my head?

24. What are you wearing? A black silk nightie.

25. Current Worry? My car.

26. Current Love? My kids.

27. Current Hate? Everyone else's kids.

28. Favorite Place To Be? In bed watching a movie.

29. Least Favorite Place? Anywhere my mom is.

30. If You Could Play an Instrument? I'd like to be able to play bass.

31. Favorite Colors? Purple.

32. Person From Your Past You Wish You Could be with Right Now? my dad.

33. Where Would You Like To Go? London.

34. Where do you want to live? Near my sisters.

35. Favorite food? Lone Star Cheese Fries (No bacon).

36. Color of most clothes you own? Black.

37. Number of pillows you sleep with? 1

38. What do you wear when you go to sleep? Nightie or jammies

39. What were you doing 12AM last night? Thinking about sleeping.

40. What do you think you'll be doing in 10 years? I really don't want to think about that.

41. Are you paranoid? Why?  Did you hear something about me that I should be worried about?

42. First piercing/tattoo? Peace sign on left shoulder blade.

43. Last person you yelled at? Person in the left lane going the speed limit.

45. Last thing you ate? A french fry.

46. If you could be a pirate, would you? Hell yes!!

47. Do you have an iPod? Nope.

49. What's in your pockets right now? Nighties don't have pockets.

50. What color are your bedroom walls? I don't have a bedroom... But I will in 12 days!!!

51. Last thing that made you laugh? My kids.

52. Any pets now? My kids.

53. Inny or an outty? Inny

54. Do you have any piercings? Just ears 3x

55. If you were a crayon what color would you be? I would be "Fuck Off".  It's a great color.

56. Have you ever won any awards? Yes, as a cheerleader and a softball player.

57. How many TV's do you have in your house? Where I am right now there are 3.

58. Have you ever sprained/broken/fractured a bone or gotten stitches? No breaks or fractures.  Lots of sprains.  Only got stitches when I had surgery.

59. Who do you tell your dreams to? Nobody.

60. If you could pick one person to make out with who would it be? Edward Norton.

61. What do you think of the person who posted this before you? I reserve the right to answer this question at a later time.

62. Screen Name? waremtae

63. Whats your middle Name? Arelia.

64. What time is it EXACTLY? 8:45:32 PM... and I am going to bed.  I am such a LOSER!!

YEA!!!!  Mom left today.  I now have my puter back.  Not much has gone on since I left, other than wanting to either slit my wrists or shoot my mom.  
I got an apartment.  I move in on the 15th.  
My car is still REALLY fucked up.  Now there is a leak in my hydraulic clutch fluid because my slave cylinder is brokeded.  I use about 24oz of fluid a day to keep it running.  
My inspection sticker expired yesterday and I am almost positive that it will fail if I take it in.  
My mom fucked up my puter the other day.  I come walking into the room and she says: "What's this mean?"  I look at the screen and my beloved computer is in DOS mode and it says it is attempting to recover from a "Major system failure".  Now, I have a 4 year warranty and tech support on my baby, but it still PISSED ME OFF!!!  She kept saying all she did was try to go to Pogo to play her games and "All of the sudden" the DOS screen came up.  Ya know something, Amber can lie better than that.  Speaking of Amber, she has her own log in on my puter and she gets online all the time... She never did anything to create a "Major system failure".  
I just got off the phone with my old boss and she asked if she could stop by to say hi... Don't get me wrong, she is awsome, but this is SOOOOOOO not what I need right now.
Well gotta go...

If I am wrong I have no problem admitting it, it's just that it doesn't happen very often. Heh heh heh
Casey has made a complete 360 as far as seeing Hailey is concerned.  He calls and asks if he can come by to see her whenever he has time.  I have to say that she really enjoys seeing him too.  With that said, he still hasn't paid his child support this month(or any month for that matter) and there are still times when he says he will come see her and doesn't call or show up.  I am not getting my hopes up that he has changed for good but the change so far is quite refreshing.  
I have some sort of infection in my lower jaw.  My teeth hurt REALLY FUCKING BAD, and I am now out of vicodin.  Does it make me a freak if I say that sometimes the pain feels kinda... nice.  Not all the time(and certainly not right now), but sometimes.  At the very least, it keeps me on my toes. It explains why I have been so damn tired lately.  Apparently, I have been running a mild fever for the past few days.  Yea me!!
I gotta go but I'll be back in a bit.

I would give a whole new meaning to the term "Daddy's Girl"
Your Daddy Is Johnny Depp
What You Call Him: Daddy-o Why You Love Him: He knows best
Who's Your Daddy?

You know you grew up in the 80's & 90's if:

1. You've ever ended a sentence with the word "SIKE".

2. You watched the Pound Puppies.

3. You can sing the rap to the "Fresh Prince of Belair"...and can do the
   "Carlton".

4. Girls wore biker shorts under their skirts and felt stylishly sexy.

5. You yearned to be a member of the Baby-sitters club and tried to
   start a club of your own.

6. You owned those lil' Strawberry Shortcake pals scented dolls.

7. You know that "WOAH " comes from Joey on Blossom.

8. Two words: Parachute Pants

9. If you ever watched "Fraggle Rock".

10. You had plastic streamers on your handlebars...and "spokey-dokes" or
    playing cards on your spokes for that incredible sound effect.

11. You can sing the entire theme song to "Duck Tales " (Woo-oooh!)

12. It was actually worth getting up early on a Saturday to watch
    cartoons.

13. You wore a ponytail on the side of your head.

14. You saw the original "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" on the big
    screen...and still know the turtle's names.

15. You got super-excited when it was Oregon Trail day in computer class
    at school.

16. You made your mom buy one of those clips that would hold your shirt
    in a knot on the side.

17. You played the game "MASH " (Mansion, Apartment, Shelter, House).

18. You wore stonewashed Jordache jean jackets and were proud of it.

19. L.A. Gear.... need I say more?

20. You wanted to change your name to "JEM " in Kindergarten. (She's truly outrageous.)

21. You remember reading "Tales of a fourth grade Nothing" and all the
    Ramona books.

22. You know the profound meaning of "WAX ON, WAX OFF".

23. You wanted to be a Goonie.

24. You ever wore fluorescent clothing. (some of us...head-to-toe)

25. You can remember what Michael Jackson looked like before his nose
    fell off and his cheeks shifted.

26. You have ever pondered why Smurfette was the only female smurf.

27. You took lunch boxes to school... and traded Garbage Pail kids in
    the schoolyard.

28. You remember the CRAZE, then the BANNING of slap bracelets.

29. You still get the urge to say "NOT " after every sentence.

30. You remember Hypercolor t-shirts.

31. Barbie and the Rockers was your favorite band.

32. You thought She-Ra (Princess of Power!) and He-Man should hook up.

33. You thought your childhood friends would never leave because you
    exchanged handmade friendship bracelets.

34. You ever owned a pair of Jelly-Shoes. (and like #24, probably in
    neon colors, too.)

35. After you saw Pee-Wee's Big Adventure you kept saying "I know you
    are, but what am I?"

36. You remember "I've fallen and I can't get up"

37. You remember going to the skating rink before there were in-line
    skates.

38. You ever got seriously injured on a Slip and Slide.

39. You have ever played with a Skip-It.

40. You had or attended a birthday party at McDonalds.

41. You've gone through this nodding your head in agreement.

42. You remember Popples.

43. "Don't worry, be happy".

44. You wore like, EIGHT pairs of socks over tights with high top
    Reeboks.

45. You wore socks scrunched down (and sometimes still do..getting
    yelled at by "younger hip" members of the family.)

46. You remember boom boxes. .. and walking around with one on your
     shoulder like you were all that.

47. You remember watching both "Gremlins " movies.

48. You know what it meant to say "Care Bear Stare!!"

49. You remember watching "Rainbow Bright" and "My Little Pony Tales."

50. You thought Doogie Howser/Samantha Micelli was hot.

51. You remember Alf, the lil furry brown alien from Melmac.

52. You remember New Kids on the Block when they were cool...and don't
    even flinch when people refer to them as "NKOTB".

53. You knew all the characters names and their life stories on "Saved
    By The Bell," The ORIGINAL class.

54. You know all the words to Bon Jovi - SHOT THROUGH THE HEART.

55. You just sang those words to yourself.

56. You remember watching Magic vs. Bird.

57. Homemade Levi shorts...the shorter the better.

58. You remember when mullets were cool!

59. You had a mullet!

60. You still sing "We are the World".

61. You tight rolled your jeans.

62. You owned a banana clip.

63. You remember "Where's the Beef?"

64. You used to (and probably still do) say "What you talkin' about
    Willis?"

65. You had big hair and you knew how to use it.

Sometimes, when I look at my kids, I don't miss sex at all!! 3. I can't have an orgasm by myself. 4. The above statement is true and it really sucks. 5. I love my new job. 6. I wish I made more money. 7. I have to pee. 8. I wish more people would make me laugh, instead of making me laugh at them. 9. My mom is going to buy a new car and give me her old one. 10. I miss my sister. 3:23(I cheated) I am not tagging anyone cause everyone I would tag has already done it.

So, I was doing my best to try to get along with Casey and I just don't think I have it in me anymore.  I don't trust him.  I never know if he is telling me the truth or lying.  Some days he seems to have it all togeather and others... it's just the same ol' shit.  Can anyone tell me why I bother?  I mean, I know I try as hard as I do for Hailey, but that can only last so long.  Casey's mom came to get Hailey this morning and she and Casey were supposed to bring her home.  Casey wasn't there.  I don't need anyone to tell me that he didn't see her today.  I am not that thick.  I guess I just had so much hope that he would snap out of his me, me, me world and WANT to spend more time with his daughter.  Oh well, you know what they say:  You can lead a horse to water but if he's a fucking dumb ass you would be better off just shooting him in the fucking head and drinking the water yourself.  
On a lighter note, I am about 10 pounds from my goal weight.  The only bad thing about that is that my clothes are hanging off me.  I still have all my pre-Hailey clothes but not to many of them are good for work.  I did find a dress my mom bought me right after I had Hailey.  I guess she was telling me in her own way that I was fat at the time cause it is a small. I am going to wear it to my office Christmas party.  I look pretty damn hot in it if I do say so my self, and I did just say so, so deal with it or fuck off.  
I need more friends.  Dirty nasty friends who I can tell my dirty nasty secrets to and never have to worry about what they will think of me.  I also need some balls.  Some big hairy ones so I can throw them in the faces of people I need to stand up to.  Kind of like "talk to the hand", ya know?  Instead it would be:  Talk to my big hairy balls, mutha fuckers!!!  The only problem is that *most* balls come with men attatched.  Lying, cheating, stealing, asshole MEN!!  No offense to the 6 or 7 of you out there that my statement does not apply to.  You know who you are, and so do I, but I am not a kiss and tell kinda girl.  
Well, I feel a bit better after my minor (and it was MINOR) outburst, so I am gonna go for now.  Have a super night everyone.  I know I will ;0)

Wow, so much has happened since I was last here I don't even know where to begin.  Honestly, I can't even begin anyway.  I have issues, lets just leave it at that shall we?!?  
I hope everyone is doing well.  When I was here last, a few people were having some problems and I hope those problems have been fixed.  If they haven't, quit whining and join the fucking club.;0)  I miss everyone quite a bit... Some more than others.  Heh heh heh  Please forgive me if I have a few spelling errors in here, I took a vicodin cause my back hurts and I haven't eaten much since Thursday (I haven't been hungry for some reason) so I am kinda mushy headed.  It's kind of nice really.  I am sitting here listening to Tool and feeling quite relaxed.  
So I am prepared for today to be a shitty day.  Casey's mom and step dad (this will be a public entry so no name calling)are coming to pick up Hailey at 8:30am. I must say I have been having serial killer fantasy's about those two... If only I could make it look like an accident. I have recently decided to try and tone down my mean spiritedness toward my enemys.  Sort of a "be the bigger person" kinda thing.  It's not working out too well though.  Some cuts are just too fucking deep.  
My car broke down on my way home from taking the kids to the zoo today.  I was there cause there was an EMT picnic and since we, at my work, teach EMT and paramedic classes, we were invited.  It was pretty fun.  The kids had a great time.  Then, we got out to the car.  The car I fucking hate with every ounce of passion I fucking have in my fucking body.  I knew as soon as I put it in 1st gear that there was something wrong.  I got to the light at Norview and Hyde Circle (in Norfolk) and it just wouldn't go into any gear.  I turned on my hazzards and called my sister.  She came and got the kids and I called AAA and waited for the tow truck.  My sister called her husband who, by the way, just got fixed on Friday, and asked him to come look at my car.  He had to come from Hampton and he got there before the tow truck and he fixed my car.  He's not too bright about most things, but he knows his way around a tool box.  All in all it was a great, then shitty, then great, then shitty day.  In other words, a normal day in the life of Dottie.   
Well I gotta go for now.  I am gonna go post some comments in a few of your LJ's so be prepared.  I must say it feels good to be back and I will try to be back to my normal funny, rude and sometimes really bitchy self in my next entry. HAGN.

I swear to the god that I do not believe exists, that if I get 1 more fucking email about making my penis harder, longer and/or harder longer, I may kill someone.  What does longer matter anyway?  I have had so tiny I didn't notice he was in there, and so long he hit bottom, not to mention a few in between.  With the exception of the one really tiny guy, whose name I won't mention(Todd O.) and the really huge vagina splitting guy, who I will only refer to as "Phone Books"(Ask Andy if you really wanna know) they are pretty much all the same.  If you know how to use it, then you are fine.  
I may start a company of my own.  You know those things they sell to stretch shoes?  I will make a sterile one to stretch vaginas.  Stop laughing and think about it for a moment... Isn't that just what the world needs?  Bigger dicks and bigger cunts?  Like we don't have enough of those.

Well, here we are AGAIN, in need of assistance. Viki and I know a few but we could sure use your help.  Thanks in advance for looking.  Here is the link.

http://www.livejournal.com/community/themoviequiz/52497.html#cutid1

I have never in my life been so moved by a story that I wrote a letter or signed a petition. That all changed today. Today, I saw a documentary called Reckless Indifference on Encore Drama. (A Starz channel) If you have this channel, find out when it comes on again and watch it. If you don't have the channel, go to the site and buy it. Injustice is not a strong enough word for what happened, and is still happening to these "boys". I don't want to go on a rant about it I just want as many people as possible to see Brandon Hein's web site. Brandon Hein and Anthony Miliotti are both serving sentences of life without parole for a crime that they didn't commit, didn't know was happening, and could not stop. PLEASE go to the site and explore. Don't just take my word for it, see the case with your own eyes. Be sure to check out the "voices" page. People from all walks of life are supporting these guys. Names like: Alan Dershowitz, Dr. Jeffrey Fagan and Charles Grodin to name a few of the more famous ones. If you are as moved by the story as I was, take a moment to sign the petition. It only takes a few seconds... compare that to the 11+ years these kids have been sitting in jail!!! If you would rather have the "short version" of the story, just click the 60 Minutes II - "Life In Prison: Felony Murder" link on the right side of the home page. PLEASE take a look and maybe post the link in your journal as well. Let justice be done, though the heavens fall~Jim Garrison~ http://www.brandonhein.com/

I am Kong.

Strong and passionate, I tend to be misunderstood, sometimes even feared. I don't want to fight, I don't want to cause trouble, all I ask is a little love, and a little peace. If I don't get what I want, I get angry, and throw barrels and flaming oil at whatever's stopping me. What Video Game Character Are You?

This is SO me, if I do say so myself.

A guy is driving around and he sees a sign in front of a house:
"Talking Dog for Sale."

He rings the bell and the owner tells him the dog is in the backyard.

The guy goes into the backyard and sees a Labrador retriever sitting
there.

"You talk?" he asks.

"Yep," the Lab replies.

"So, what's your story?"

The Lab looks up and says, "Well, I discovered that I could talk when I
was pretty young, and I wanted to help the government, so I told the CIA
about my gift, and in no time at all, they had me jetting from country
to country, sitting in rooms with spies and world leaders, because no
one figured a dog would be eavesdropping. I was one of their most
valuable spies for eight years running. But the jetting around really
tired me out, and I knew I wasn't getting any younger so I wanted to
settle down. I signed up for a job at the airport to do some undercover
security work, mostly wandering near suspicious characters and listening
in. I uncovered some incredible dealings and was awarded a batch of
medals. I got married, had a mess of puppies, and now I'm just retired."

The guy is amazed. He goes back in and asks the owner what he wants for
the dog.

"Ten dollars." The guy says.

"This dog is amazing. Why on earth are you selling him so cheap?"

"Because he's a liar. He didn't do any of that shit."

Yes, I mowed the lawn.  I started last night at 6:30 and stopped at 9:30.  Does that seem like a long time to simply cut grass?  Well wait, there's more.  I said I stopped, I didn't say I finished.  When I got home from work today I started again. (At 6:30)  I finished at 7:30.  4 fucking hours to mow less than a 1/2 acre of grass.  Why so long you ask?  Well let me tell you...I was using an electric lawn mower and every 5 minutes or so it would clog and trip the circuit breaker.  The very best part is that the mower doesn't have a bag so I had to rake the lawn when I was done.(I only raked 1/2 though)  My arms hurt so bad right now.  The lawn is making me lower my standards too.  Since dumping my ex, I have dreamed of a hot guy who will be good to me and my girls.  Now, I'll settle for a geek with a good gas mower.  
I am gonna go night-night.  I just want to say I miss everyone.  Not being able to use my own computer sucks, but I have been getting some much needed sleep.  
Much love to those I love, and much pain to those I don't.

I don't watch many TV shows on a regular basis.  I used to watch Friends, I watch the Soprano's and Six Feet Under.  Now, I watch House @9pm every Tuesday.  I can't say enough good things about this show.  The first time I saw it I was hooked.  If you can catch an episode you should.  Dr. House, played by Hugh Laurie is great.  Just do yourself a favor and watch it.

First off, thanks to all who wished me a happy birthday.  It was, however, one of the worst I've had.  Yes, it was worse than when my mom forgot my 18th birthday.  Yes, it was worse than when, on my 30th birthday, my ex wished me a happy 29th birthday.  Wanna know why it was so bad?  Well screw you I need to vent so I am gonna tell you anyway.
1. It took us 11 hours to get home.  
2. <u>MY</u> total gas bill for the trip was $120.
3. Some fucknut driving down I95 had drywall tied to his roof and it apparently fell off.  I was in one of the center lanes and could not avoid running over it.  It broke the floodlight and the bumper of the car.  MY SISTER'S CAR!!!  
4. I found out my insurance won't cover it.

Before anyone asks, no I didn't get fucknut's plate number.  We didn't think it did any damage to the car and didn't find out it had until about 2 hours later when we stopped. Plus, he was about 1 mile ahead, pulled over fixing the ropes the held the drywall on the truck.  I feel SO fucking bad.  My sister loaned me her car and I mucked it up.  I know it wasn't my fault, but it is my responsibility. Everyone keeps saying there was nothing I could do, but I still feel horrible.  

To top it all off, "the bitch" comes back to work tomorrow.  I didn't get a call that her plane crashed or that she was shot during a mugging, so my birthday wish didn't come true either.  All in all it was a VERY shitty birthday.  

Well, I have taken 4 tylenol and my back will not stop screaming at me so I guess I am gonna go lay on the heating pad.  I hope everyone had a better weekend than me.
Hi all!!  I'm in PA.  My fruckin back hurts from driving.  I'll be home on Sunday.  Yea for me!!  I get to drive for 9 hours on  my birthday.  I hope everyone has a good weekend!!

I took the kids to the zoo today.  As you walk in, there are 4-6 fountains surrounding a huge marble ball made to look like earth.  Kids (adults too) are allowed to play in the fountains.  Just in front of the whole set-up is a sign that reads: Shirt and shoes required.  Upon reading this Amber turns to me and says: "Mom, can I take off my pants?  The sign says shirt and shoes required, but it doesn't say anything about pants.  So... can I?"
Later, while we were watching the bison, Amber noticed some trash on the inside of the fence.  "Mom, why do people litter?  Is it because they are stupid or did no one ever tell them it was wrong?"  Just then a woman and her SIX KIDS came up to the fence.  One of them, a boy about 10-12 years old dropped a piece of trash on the ground.  Amber sprung into action.  "Pick that up.  You can't litter here.  The wind could blow that onto the other side of the fence and the bison could choke on it.  Shesh, there's a trash can right behind you."  The mother glared at me and I turned to fully face her and said "She's right."  The boy picked up the trash and threw it into the trash can.  I was so proud of Amber that I HAD to buy her some Dippin Dots... twice.
This was Hailey's first trip to the zoo and she had a great time.  Her favorite part was seeing the squirrel monkeys.  They came right up to the glass and said hi.  She screamed with delight.  After the zoo, we went to a park and put Hailey on the baby swing.  She LOVED it.  Each time the swing would come toward me she would scream.  I got some great pics and I will post a few soon. 
That was the best Sunday I've had in a long time. I hope everyone sleeps well.  I think I might since "the bitch" and "bitch jr." are both on vacation next week.  Woo hoo!!  Should be an awsome week.  Peace
